item.title: thousands flee sudan's abyei as militias move south
item.description: tens of thousands of people fled sudan's contested abyei region as northern militias accused of helping seize the area over the weekend moved further south, the united nations said on wednesday.

item.title: analysis: lockheed hack highlights cyber-blame snags
